Subject: systemctl service epp-client-daemon-d exit code:4
Description:
We are getting an alert for 'systemctl service epp-client-daemon-d exit code:4'

Can you confirm 'epp-client-daemon-d' correct name of the service ? ( also this error we had seen when we were replying from 1.5.8 to 2.4.2.1 version)

# Alert msg: "systemctl service epp-client-daemon-d exit code:4"
[anhhung.nguyen@bulwark01.ycg0:/home/users/anhhung.nguyen]$ pbrun systemctl status epp-client-daemon-d
Unit epp-client-daemon-d.service could not be found.

[anhhung.nguyen@bulwark01.ycg0:/home/users/anhhung.nguyen]$ echo $?
4

# there is some sort of epp-client-daemon process
[anhhung.nguyen@bulwark01.ycg0:/home/users/anhhung.nguyen]$ ps ax | grep epp-client
   1680 ?        Sl   283:10 /opt/cososys/sbin/epp-client-daemon
